alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cherokee; Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 5:30AM CDT until April 01 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN...SOUTHEASTERN ETOWAH AND CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 530 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Gaylesville to near Moshat to near Glencoe, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Centre, Cedar Bluff, Forney, Centre Municipal Airport, Glencoe, Gaylesville, Tennala, Pleasant Gap, Cornwall Furnace Park, Eastern Weiss Lake, Ballplay, Gadsden Mall, Moshat, Ball Flat, Neely Henry Lake and Western Weiss Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
